dao.name: QRY_ROOM_RF
dao.statement: SELECT * FROM ROOM_RF WHERE trim(athena_id) = trim(:athena_id)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_RF_DELETE
dao.statement: select count(*) from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and room_typ = :room_typ

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_RF_ROOM_TYP
dao.statement: select DISTINCT rvrm.room_typ value, rtrim(rvrm.room_typ) || ':' || rtrim(rm.room_nam) display from room_rf rm INNER JOIN RVRMCOD_RF rvrm on rvrm.ROOM_TYP = RM.ROOM_TYP where rvrm.athena_id = trim(:athena_id)

dao.name: QRY_SERVICE_RF_ITEM_NOS
dao.statement: select item_nos value,rtrim(item_nos) || ':' || rtrim(item_sna) display from service_rf where athena_id = :athena_id

dao.name: QRY_SERVICE_RF_FREE_COD
dao.statement: select item_nos value,rtrim(item_nos) || ':' || rtrim(item_sna) display from service_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and serv_typ = '99'
